title: Being able to 1v3 with 10% health is completely healthy for the game.

replies.body: hes getting nerfed next patch, he would of died with the nerfs, stop crying now.

Honestly, it might be best to just change the heal into a flat heal (assuming the next nerfs don't do enough to him)

Something like 50/75/100/125/150 health regained per enemy champion hit, realistically you'd be healing around 150~300 hp a majority of the time, 450 on somewhat rare occassions; 600~750 if you're a god and can somehow hit 4~5 people with your axe blade all at once.

Numbers are obviously just examples but you get the idea.
